item.description: If you want to use Twitter’s Twemoji across your website, enable it in your config.toml [params] enableTwemoji = true This will not only give your website unified emojis across all platforms. It will also give you the latest Unicode 13 emoji set, such as ðŸ§‹ðŸ«•ðŸ›»ðŸª—ðŸªž.
